name: Space Piercer (itch)
description:
Shoot your way to the front A game loosely inspired by Bong Joon-ho's Snowpiercer
  • Fast Paced Bullet Hell Style Game Play
    • You will be required to plan your every step be it strategic strafing or covering.
  • Engaging AI
    • The AI is unforgiving and will keep you on your toes 
  • Interesting Environments
  • Short Length 
  • Passive but Captivating Story
  • WASD/Arrow Keys to Move.
  • Mouse to aim and Left Mouse the shoot
  • R to reload and F to pickup weapons and ammo
  • 1 and 2 to change weapon slots
  • C to crouch 
  • Esc to Pause
System Requirements 

Built on Ryzen 5 2500U, RX560X and 8gb Ram.

Will run on anything that is not a potato. (64 bit required) 

I'm a 17 year old high school student. I'm very passionate about games and I tried my best with this one. I hope you enjoy the game!

If you liked the game, please rate and comment you experience. Consider donating. It would help me a ton!

All proceeds help me to buy new and better components for my Laptop so that I can make even better games for you guys!
